ing: 1 fluid ounce brandy-based orange liqueur (such as Grand MarnierÂ®)
des: "This recipe is great on a cold winter day, or just use it to relax! Divide into 2 equal parts - 1 for you and 1 for the Leprechaun."
ins: Pour hot coffee into a mug. Stir in Grand Marnier and Irish cream. Top with a dollop of whipped cream, and sprinkle with grated orange rind.
